mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Hot Line - Late News", "As I See It", "Big Events of 1974", "Planning a Fun-Nighter Dance", "Youth on the Square", "A History of Square Dancing", "Smoother Dancing Poster", "Take a Good Look - Scoot Back", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Square Dance Diary", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers: Roy and Jean Green", "Callers Text - Chapter Thirty", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab - Turn Thru", "National Square Dance Convention", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "Caller of the Month: Dennis Spackman", "On the Record: Reviews", and "Fashion Feature".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
